channel.title: Shortcodes on Graytr
channel.description: Recent content in Shortcodes on Graytr

item.title: SVG Wrapper
item.description: SVG Wrapper Wrap SVG with dark/bright color styles, it’s useful for dark mode compatibility. Usage {{< svg-wrapper name="" link="" >}} svg inline {{< /svg-wrapper >}} Paramters: link: Render link for svg name: Use theme built-in svg Available Built-in SVG Icon from Material Design name svg arrow-down arrow-right earth moon sun Icons from Simple Icons
